contentList: Don’t lose hope. When the SUN goes down, the STARS come out.
Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
Each new day greets us with no rules...
Every new day gives new things and there we create new memories.
Everything changes. We plant trees for those born later.
Everything you do makes a difference, but it is up to you to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
Faith is bigger than fear :)
Find a heart that will love you at your worst and arms that will hold you at your weakest.
Forget about all the reasons why something may not work. You only need to find one good reason why it will.
Forget what you heard, recognize what you see.
Forgiveness is the Sweetest Revenge.
Friendship is a language spoken by heart, not written on paper, it is a promise on this promise day, to renewed every time we keep in touch. Happy Promise Day!
Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
Goals are dreams with deadlines.
Good or bad, just smile. You have a lot to be thankful for.
H.O.P.E. = Hold On, Pain Ends. :)
Happiness is found when you stop comparing yourself to other people.
Hard times always reveal true friends.
Hello, I’m still here.
Hey, Don't I Know You? Yeah, You're The Girl With The Beautiful Smile.
I Hope You Know CPR, Cuz You Take My Breath Away!
I found the reason to smile, the day I found you.
I think, therefore I am.
If people are trying to bring you down it only means that you are above them.
If you fall. I’ll be there.
In three word I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It Goes On.
It always seems impossible until it is done.
